question: Which of the following is a correct decreasing order?
option1: Repo Rate >Marginal Standing Facility > Reverse Repo Rate
option2: Marginal Standing Facility >Repo Rate >Reverse Repo Rate
option3: Reverse Repo Rate > Marginal Standing Facility >Repo Rate
option4: Reverse Repo Rate> Repo Rate> Marginal Standing Facility
answer: Marginal Standing Facility >Repo Rate >Reverse Repo Rate
explanation: Kindly remember that MSF is highest while Reverse Repo is lowest among these three while Repo remains in Middle.
